Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It's Veronica. Would you please open the door?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I have some incredible news to tell you about
Oak Tree Town's prosperity!
<PAGE>
Our dream of being a trade city with ties to a
multitude of countries has finally come true!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I never could have believed our desires would be
realized this quickly, and we have you to thank
for it, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm inviting all the farmers and merchants to a
party right now, and I'd be honored if you'd join
us.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, everyone, for joining us today. I am
Veronica, the Guild Master.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks to the tireless efforts of everyone here,
Oak Tree Town has finally become a world-
renowned trade city!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Looking back, we went through many trials and
surmounted many obstacles to reach this point.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But our farmers never wavered in their efforts to
make this town shine through their crops and
products.
<PAGE>
Little by little, the things they shipped gained
recognition, bringing more merchants to trade
with us.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It was that unwavering effort that has brought us
here, with partners from many lands that help us
both learn and grow.
<PAGE>
Without you, none of this would have come
about. You have my highest thanks.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
My only wish is that the late Madam Eda, whose
loss we still feel, could have been here with us
to see this historic day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But if I know her, I'm sure she's watching and
smiling on us from above.
<PAGE>
Everyone, let us continue to trade, and in doing
so, help each other and our countries reach even
greater prosperity!
Eda... Are you watching, wherever you are?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think we all owe a special thanks to you,
<MYNAME>. That we were able to come this far
is due in large part to your efforts.
<PAGE>
I still remember the day you sent in your
application for the opening we'd posted for a
farmer.
<PAGE>
It was the day the wheels of fate really began to
turn for our town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>With you here, Oak Tree Town has really
flourished, and we're all very, very grateful.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, <MYNAME>, you're really something else. I
was a farmer long before you, but look at all
you've managed to accomplish!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now you're a big-time farmer who's the face of
our whole town! That's pretty amazing!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_FLAME_L><FACE_ANGRY>But don't go resting on your laurels... I'm not
gonna play second fiddle to you forever! One day
I'm gonna be top dog!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>You and me, we're gonna be rivals for a long
time to come, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>When you first arrived, I thought you a frail bud,
barely broken through the earth.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But before I knew it, you had blossomed into a
strong, vibrant person. I'm proud you chose to
call our town home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>As two citizens who love the beauty of their
home, let us continue to grow and flourish
together.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've learned many valuable lessons from you
about what it means to be a farmer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>There's much more to it than simply owning
land and having servants tend to dozens of
crops.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The way you did things was so different from
the method I had been taught.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L><FACE_LAUGH>But by following your own way, you became a
splendid farmer! I look forward to trading more
tips with you.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
<MYNAME>, as the representative of all the
merchants who do business here, let me give
you our deepest gratitude.
<PAGE>
When you first came to this town, I was the only
trader still making stops here.
<PAGE>
But now, this town has become a thriving hub
of trade, with merchants coming through all the
time.
<PAGE>
In fact, it's fair to say that this town has become
more than just a trading town -- it's a bridge
between countries.
<PAGE>
As someone who's watched this town grow and
prosper through the years, you have my heartfelt
thanks, <MYNAME>.
